title: Best of The Herd: 07/16/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 07/16/2019
description:
The Cowboys should trade Ezekiel Elliott because he already wants a new contract and is there only young player that is trouble off the field. Aaron Rodgers is no longer a player that a GM would want to start a franchise with because he's getting old and is difficult to work with. Plus, TJ Houshmandzadeh tells Colin why players care so much about their Madden rankings and why Dak is more important to the Cowboys than Zeke.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
